titleStmt.title: Letter, James L. Dodds in France to Ellen Smith in Jackson, Tenn., 1918 Sept. 9

publicationStmt.publisher: The University of Tennessee Libraries Digital Initiatives

availability.p: The copyright interests in this collection remain with the creator. For more information, contact the Special Collections Library.

bibl.title: Letter, James L. Dodds in France to Ellen Smith in Jackson, Tenn., 1918 Sept. 9

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: Will try and writh you a few lines this rainy night, Has been raining here all day and of course I got wet we work rain or shine So you can guess how bad I hate to see it rain
I havent heard from you in most two weeks I wonder what is the matter. To buisey I guess we are getting out mail pretty regular now I hope we can keep .on writting it regular.
Every thing is running along pretty well hire. Thre is no news of enterest so cant write much. Will try and find out some thing for next week.
Write me real soon with lots of news.
